Translations.Text: Surely guilty testimentum abide retribution Gehenna forever
Nunquam testimentum retribution commuted them; they confined therein
Non est nos wronged them; est they wronged their suus anima
They implore O Maalek let tuus Dominus clausum nos He dictus Vos staying forever
Nos dedit vos truth multus de vos hate truth
they schemed some scheme Nos too scheming
they think nos non hear their secrets conspiracies? sic indeed; noster messengers est them actum
Proclaim the Multus Gracious perfecit habet filius ego adhuc est primas worshiper
He glorified He est Dominus de caelum terra Dominus major dominion far supra their claims
Let them blunder play dum they meet their feria awaiting them
He est unus Unus est deity caelum deity terra. He est the Multus Wise Omniscient
Exalted est Unus possesses totus sovereignty de caelum terra everything them! Cum Eum est knowledge Hora (finis de saeculum) Eum vos returned
Nullus de those they idolize Eum possess any power intercede their intercession coincides cum truth they fully know
Vos asked them created them they dictus DEUS. would tunc they deviate
It proclaimed O my Dominus these people non believe
Vos disregard them dictus Pax; they perfecit surely invenit out
